Request

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • Request.Request
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    urgentRequest

    public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    Request class is the class that represents all the information about a request of a member registered in TimeBanks website, mainly: The title of the request The description of the request the date of the request the time of the request the time required in order for the request to be accomplished the category of the request the service of the request the status of the request
    See Also:
    Service, Status, Category
